title: TPACK-Based Peer Assessment Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative peer assessment process for social studies and technology-enhanced learning design in simulation/VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain the seven knowledge domains of the TPACK framework.
Learners can systematically analyze peer learning designs according to evaluation criteria and provide feedback.
Learners can iteratively revise and improve social studies technology-integrated lesson designs in simulation/VR environments at least three times.
Learners can visually represent their instructional design ideas as modular prototypes using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
